author: Nero
install_msg: LibertyBank installed. Use [p]eddies to get started.
name: LibertyBank
short: TTRPG party fund and character money management.
description: A purpose-built banking cog for tabletop RPGs. Manage individual character funds, a shared party treasury, and view a full transaction ledger. Designed for Cyberpunk Red but works for any game.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs, display names, account balances, and transaction history on a per-server basis.
